server.name: global-jdbc-sql
server.title: Global JDBC SQL Server Connector
server.description: MCP server for connecting to SQL Server databases via JDBC with comprehensive query capabilities

packages.installationInstructions: Download JAR files from: https://github.com/kobyal/mcp-registry-q/releases/download/v1.0.0/MCPServer-1.0.0-runner.jar and https://github.com/kobyal/mcp-registry-q/releases/download/v1.0.0/mssql-jdbc-12.4.2.jre11.jar. Place both files in the same directory and ensure Java 21+ is installed.
